meta.content: Front Page; New York and Region
meta.name: online_sections

block.p: Filing Suggests Nascent Plot A reading of the criminal complaint filed by the federal authorities against four men charged in a plot to bomb Kennedy International Airport suggests a terror plan that was less than fully mature.
PAGE B1
Liver Cancer Drug Promising A new drug looks poised to become the first effective treatment for liver cancer, one of the most common and deadliest cancers in the world, doctors said.
PAGE A14
At-Home Fertility Test A new at-home screening test with components for men and women lets couples find out if they have fertility problems without stepping into a doctor's office.
PAGE A12
Yankees Beat Boston in 9th Alex Rodriguez hit a home run in the ninth inning to lift the Yankees to a 6-5 victory over the Red Sox in the series finale at Fenway Park.
SPORTSMONDAY
Support for Climate Plan Amid the doubts about President Bush's new plan for cutting greenhouse gases was a substantial dose of support, albeit conditional.
PAGE A9
